amendment.description: To establish greater energy efficiency and cost-effectiveness in building codes.

action.text: Amendment SA 1514 proposed by Senator Portman to Amendment SA 1407. (consideration: CR S1582; text: CR S1604-1606) To establish greater energy efficiency and cost-effectiveness in building codes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1514 proposed by Senator Portman to Amendment SA 1407.
